definition: to harbor evil intentions (idiom); concealing malice
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: His political opponents made a calculated attack on him.
sentences.chinese: 他的政敵們對他進行了包藏禍心的攻擊。
